pr_title: ISPN-11959 Add custom NonBlockingStore server test

timeline.bodyText: Is there a need to create a Suite here? It seems overkill IMO.
timeline.author: ryanemerson

replies.bodyText: Fine by me, is there an example of one where it isn't done by a test Suite?
replies.author: wburns
